CustomField.description: This is the username of the user that will own any contacts created in Merchant Portal Access Management. The username must be a user with a role and must be visible to the current logged in user (ie. a part of the community)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the username of the user that will own any contacts created in Merchant Portal Access Management. The username must be a user with a role and must be visible to the current logged in user (ie. a part of the community)
CustomField.label: Contact Owner Username
